column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////There are a million great things to say about Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba! From their drinks to their wide variety of tapas plates
column2: every thing is fantastic. It is tough to get a reservation on a weekend
column3: so book in advance. I recommend the chef's artisanal cheese selection
column7: sangria (red and white) and their mojitos. I have only been here for dinner
column8: but I can not imagine them doing any thing sub-par. Amazing restaurant!
